Gravitational Wave Emission

Radially resolved gravitational wave signal for a 35 M\(_\odot\) progenitor. The signal corresponds to a quadrupole \(g\) mode inside the Proto-Compact Star. The upper panel shows the GW amplitude at 5km, 6km, and 8km.



z35:CMF
